name: Tony Hawk's Project 8 Mobile
summary:
If it's speed you're after, it's speed you're going to get. Tony Hawk has gone mobile in a whole new and exciting way, with some mad speed, sweet tricks and fantastically smooth animation. In order to beat the best skaters around, including Tony Hawk himself, all you need to do is hit the correct directions at the correct time.

Hit enough and you'll score big and boost your speed, but fail and your skater will eat gravel. Think you've got what it takes to place 1st and taste the glory?
